methods.name: Run
methods.logic: This method executes the machine lowering phase of the Turboshaft compiler. It takes the pipeline data and a temporary zone as input and performs the necessary transformations to lower the intermediate representation to a machine-specific level. The exact details of the transformations would be found in the implementation of this method in the corresponding .cc file.

constants.name: MachineLowering
constants.logic: Represents a constant identifier (enum value or similar) that identifies this specific phase in the Turboshaft pipeline.  `DECL_TURBOSHAFT_PHASE_CONSTANTS` is a macro that likely defines this constant.
